channel.title: Network on MILAI AI
channel.description: Recent content in Network on MILAI AI

item.title: Network
item.description: DNS vim /etc/resolv.conf nameserver 8.8.8.8 nameserver 8.8.4.4 APT $ sudo touch /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/proxy.conf $ sudo gedit /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/proxy.conf Acquire { HTTP::proxy "http://127.0.0.1:8080"; HTTPS::proxy "http://127.0.0.1:8080"; } Sftp 安装 ssh 服务端 sudo apt-get install openssh-server 显示 sshd 即可以成功连接 ps -e |grep ssh 如果不显示 sshd sudo /etc/init.d/ssh start SSH能连接上，但SFTP
